name: Haunted House (is haunted)
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #52

Spot the real ghosts using the flashlight and banish them! Also collect the scattered items that do not belong to the Haunted House.

Controls:

-Move mouse to look around
-Left click to expel ghosts and to pick up items
-Right click to turn on and off the flashlight
-Esc to show the menu
